code: import React,{useContext,useEffect,useState}from"react";import data from"../Data/Data.js";import".//CSS/Projects.css";import{LanguageVerisi}from"../contexts/LanguageContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Projects=function Projects(){var _useContext=useContext(LanguageVerisi),language=_useContext.language;console.log("dsadsa",language);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"ProjectsMain",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"ProjectsContainer1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:language==="tr-TR"?"Projeler":"Projects"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"ProjectsContainer2",children:data.filter(function(item){return item.language===language;}).map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Sayfalarim",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"DataFoto",src:"/images/".concat(item.image),alt:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"DataBaslik",children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"DataAciklama",children:item.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Yazilimlar",children:item.yazilimlari.map(function(yazilim){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"DataYazilimlar",children:yazilim},yazilim);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"DataLinkler",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{rel:"noreferrer",target:"_blank",href:item.githubLink,children:"Github"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{rel:"noreferrer",target:"_blank",href:item.websiteLink,children:language==="tr-TR"?"Siteye Git":"View Site"})]})]},item.id);})})]});};export default Projects;
